title: Software Engineer Intern
shortDescription: Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js. Created internal documentation and participated in code reviews.
longDescription: As a Software Engineer Intern at Rose-Hulman Ventures, I was responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js. My role involved creating internal documentation to facilitate knowledge sharing among team members and participating in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that met client requirements.

title: Teaching Assistant
shortDescription: Assisted students in laboratory for introductory systems programming course. Provided support in understanding concepts and debugging code.
longDescription: In my role as a Teaching Assistant at Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology, I assisted students in the laboratory for an introductory systems programming course. My responsibilities included providing support to students in understanding complex programming concepts, debugging code, and guiding them through practical exercises.

title: Web Developer
shortDescription: Designed and built responsive websites for small businesses. Focused on user experience and SEO optimization.
longDescription: As a freelance web developer, I collaborated with small business owners to design and build responsive websites tailored to their needs. I emphasized user experience, accessibility, and SEO best practices to help clients grow their online presence. My work included both front-end and back-end development, as well as ongoing maintenance and support.

title: Data Science Intern
shortDescription: Analyzed large datasets and built predictive models to support business decisions.
longDescription: During my internship at Acme Analytics, I worked with large datasets to uncover insights and trends. I developed predictive models using Python and machine learning libraries, and presented findings to stakeholders to inform business strategies. My role also involved data cleaning, visualization, and collaborating with other data professionals.

title: IT Support Specialist
shortDescription: Provided technical support and troubleshooting for hardware and software issues.
longDescription: As an IT Support Specialist at Tech Solutions Inc., I assisted employees with technical issues related to hardware, software, and networking. I managed help desk tickets, performed system upgrades, and documented solutions for recurring problems. My proactive approach helped minimize downtime and improve overall productivity.
